name: Chevin Forest park
opening_hours_mon_fri: April to November - Tuesday to Friday 10am to 2pmDecember to March – Wednesdays 10am to 2pm
other_comments:
The White House Café is located in the heart of Chevin Forest Park and vehicular access is via a steep, mile-long tarmac road.  The road is narrow at points with some passing places, and may be closed if affected by snow or ice.
Limited parking is available close to the Education Building.  Please ring ahead to book a place by calling 01943 465023.
location: DDA compliant ramped access leads from the car park to the ground floor of the Education Building where the Changing Places toilet is located.
